title: LP Losing
body: Hi! Umm... i have a realy urgent question about Losing LP... when somebody is AFK in game after first 3 mins. (so we cant rmk) and he got leaver buster... why we lose 20 LP because of him????? It is so triggering...

replies.body: I just ended a game where our Karma went afk after 5 mins. of game... and i lost all of my 18 LP so i have now 0.

Only the leaver and anyone else who was afk during this time would receive the remake penalty.  The only exception here would be premades in Diamond, where the entire party would receive a loss as a result per our [Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).  Looking in your recent games, though, I don't see anything that resulted from being marked as a leaver or remake for you.  Let me know if that clears things up!
